mapper.select: select pic_no, pic_title, mem_no, category_no, tag_name, pic_content, pic_count, good_count, pic_add, to_date(pic_date, 'yy-mm-dd') pic_date, pic_open, pic_location from picture where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by pic_date desc
select to_date(pic_date, 'yy-mm-dd') pic_date from picture where mem_no = #{mem_no} group by to_date(pic_date, 'yy-mm-dd') order by to_date(pic_date, 'yy-mm-dd') desc
select to_char(pic_date, 'YYYY-MM') pic_date from picture where mem_no = #{mem_no} group by to_char(pic_date, 'YYYY-MM') order by pic_date desc
mapper.update: update picture set pic_open = #{pic_open} where pic_no = #{pic_no}
